thread.title: adidas Originals Drops a Pack of Chunky Platform Superstars
thread.title_full: adidas Originals Drops a Pack of Chunky Platform Superstars

author: Graeme Campbell
title: adidas Originals Drops a Pack of Chunky Platform Superstars
text:
Visit the original post to see all 3 images from this gallery. 
Brand : adidas Originals
Model : Superstar Bold
Key Features : Serrated three stripes and “Superstar” foil print are incorporated on a leather upper, with the iconic white shell toe complemented with a chunky platform midsole. Available in women’s sizes only.
Price : Approximately $120
Availability : On sale now at Overkill .
Editor’s Notes : What can go wrong by adding a dope platform midsole to the classic Superstar? Nothing, evidently. Optioned in either “Black/White or “White,” the new kicks offer a less ostentatious entry point to the current day chunky sneaker craze.
Staying with women’s footwear, here are the best kicks we seen on show at Tokyo Fashion Week FW17.
